Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Columbus in 1975...
Traded from Columbus to Boston (UBA) on 2/12/1975 (Going to PIL: 2B C. Arispe, P G. Thor, 3B J. Maes. Going to CBC: P K. Taylor)...
Injured on 4/13/1976 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Lynchburg on 4/16/1978 (Going to LYN: 2B C. Arispe, P L. Rios. Going to PIL: 3B R. Dorn)...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1979, off David Terrill (GHG)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1979, off Cody Wilson (TRO)...
Drove in 6 runs against Diablo on 4/27/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1980, hitting .409 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1981, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 5/19/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,216,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Lynchburg on 2/10/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1987, hitting .337 with 14 HR, 36 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1987, hitting .385 with 5 HR, 15 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/11/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $496,800 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/7/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $477,300 per year...
